entities.name: rope
entities.description: The rope is being pulled towards the light in the centre of the cavern.

entities.name: light
entities.description: There is a light at the centre of the cavern.

entities.name: walls
entities.description: The walls of the cavern are no longer visible to Harry and his companions.

entities.name: boat
entities.description: A boat is being used by Harry and his companions.

entities.name: water
entities.description: The group is floating on the water.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the people in the boat.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is another person in the boat.

relationships.description: Harry and his companions are floating on the water.
The boat is carving deep ripples upon the glassy surface of the water.
Harry can see the light at the centre of the cavern.
Dumbledore is also floating on the water.
A human hand was seen floating in the water by Harry.
